ChunkText: students must print out and sign their stem OPT I-20 with blue ink. submitting an application without a signature will result in a denial. finally, students must upload all required documentation and submit their i-765 application using the uscis online application system. the current fee for submitting an i-765 is $470.
ContextBefore: electronic filing help step 2: submit form i-765 application to uscis the isss office will review each stem OPT request and email the student about any potential edits students should make on their draft form i-765. students will also be able to view their stem OPT I-20 in their request.
ContextAfter: i-765 filing tips before you submit: double check to see if stem OPT requested with the requested start and end dates is on the second page of your i-20! if you submit your stem OPT application to uscis without this stem OPT request listed, it will be automatically denied!
